post.title: Blogs
post.body:
Blogs are the coolest thing ever. A window to the minds of others.

I'll add those I come across to my sidebar. OK?

post.title: Popularity
post.body:
I wonder if ZeroNet popularity can be measured by the number of people who choose to continue hosting your site. If my words resonate with you, will you decide not to delete this page from the left hand panel? 

Will you permit me to consume a small amount of your resource - paid for with your hard earned money - even if I have little to offer?

Is the number of people who host your site a key indicator of your content's worth? The key measurement to feed in to your `Pagerank' algorithm?

post.title: Nothing to say
post.body:
On occasions I've created a blog and written very little. That I have written is often of little or no interest to others.

Here we go again!
